Privacy Policy

Your trust is our priority. Here's how we protect your data.

Introduction

At QuantumSoft, safeguarding your personal information is of utmost importance. This Privacy Policy outlines our data handling practices to ensure transparency and compliance with legal requirements.

üîí

Data We Collect

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, etc.
  • Usage Data: Browser type, IP address, device information, and browsing activity.
  • Cookies: Data to enhance user experience and preferences.
üìà

How We Use Your Data

  • Improving our services and website functionality.
  • Providing efficient customer support.
  • Sending newsletters, updates, and promotional offers.
  • Ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.
ü§ù

Data Sharing

We may share your information with trusted third parties under the following conditions:

  • To comply with legal obligations or government requests.
  • To enhance our services via partnerships or service providers.
  • During business transitions, such as mergers or acquisitions.
üîê

Security Measures

We take the security of your data seriously by implementing:

  • Encryption for data transmission and storage.
  • Secure servers and firewalls.
  • Regular security audits and updates.
üìú

Your Rights

As a user, you have the right to:

  • Access, modify, or delete your personal data.
  • Withdraw consent for data processing.
  • File complaints with a data protection authority.
üç™

Cookies Policy

We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and provide personalized content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

üìû

Contact Support

If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, feel free to contact us:

  • Email: contact@quantumsofttechnologies.com
  • Phone: +91-7498857371
